title: Integrating Advanced Predictive Models with Experimental Catalysis to Optimize H₂ Production in Dry Reforming Using Nickel on Metalized-Silica-Alumina Catalysts
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00867G, Paper
Open Access

Ahmed Al-Fatesh, Ahmed I. Osman, Ibrahim Aidid, Yousef Mohammed Alanazi, Anis H. Fakeeha, Ahmed Abasaeed, Fahad S. AlMubaddel
This study explores the enhancement of hydrogen production via dry reforming of methane (DRM) using nickel catalysts supported on metalized silica-alumina. By incorporating noble metals (Ir, Pd, Pt, Ru, Rh),...
